subject: I know your secret
body:
Sorry for the delay;
 
A few months ago we sent out an email stating that our
extended man product would be in stores soon.
Well, it took longer than expected to become HDA approved.
We are the only male lengthening system that is certified by
the HDA and that is for 1 reason…..WE WORK.
 
We have further information available on our website:
http://www.extendedman.com
 
Have a great weekend;
 
Mike
Marketing
Extended Man Inc.
 
 
 
 




If you no longer would like to receive emails from= 
 Extended Man Inc. then please use our remove link below.  We appolgize if this email was not intended for you.
http://extendedman.com/r.php
